title: Chicken Biryani
context: The most popular dish in India
description: Chicken Biryani is a savory chicken and rice dish that includes layers of chicken, rice, and aromatics that are steamed together. The bottom layer of rice absorbs all the chicken juices as it cooks, giving it a tender texture and rich flavor, while the top layer of rice turns out white and fluffy.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
context: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs and cheese
description: Spaghetti Carbonara is a classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, eggs, pancetta, and grated Pecorino Romano cheese. The eggs are beaten together with the cheese to create a creamy sauce that coats the pasta, while the pancetta adds a salty, savory flavor.

title: Beef Stroganoff
context: A hearty Russian dish with spices
description: Beef Stroganoff is a hearty Russian dish made with tender strips of beef, mushrooms, and onions in a creamy sauce. The dish is typically served over egg noodles or rice, and is perfect for a cozy winter meal.

title: Margherita Pizza
context: A classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
description: Margherita Pizza is a classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves. It is a simple yet delicious pizza that showcases the flavors of the ingredients. The tomato sauce provides a tangy and savory base, while the mozzarella cheese melts and becomes gooey, and the fresh basil adds a hint of freshness.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
context: Classic homemade cookies with chocolate chips
description: Chocolate Chip Cookies are classic homemade cookies made with butter, sugar, eggs, flour, and chocolate chips. They are soft, chewy, and loaded with gooey chocolate chips. These cookies are perfect for any occasion and are loved by both kids and adults.
